thongtin: On the occasion of the girl's birthday, the boy confessed to her
When the two were married, the wife discovered that her best friend had confessed to her man
Discovered ex-lover proposed to another girl on the street
The girl was confessed to by the boy in the garbage dump.
The boy confessed but the girl refused because she already has someone she likes
When he was drunk, the boy confessed his love to the girl
The girl who regrets rejecting another guy's confession to marry is now a ghost man.
The girl rejects the guy because he is a Luffy pirate pirate.
Accepted the boy's confession, but the girl's family objected because of her family background
The girl cursed at the boy, for confessing there was only a flower but not a branded bag
The boy confessed his love so romantic that it made the girl sleepless all night.
The girl told her best friend about the boy who confessed to her. But unexpectedly he is the secret lover of her best friend
The boy sent a love letter to the girl but his best friend hid it.
Right in front of the group of friends, the boy confessed to the girl. The girl agrees but it's a bet
After 4 failed confessions, he decided to give up on the girl and go with his best friend
The boy who confessed to his boss was rejected, because she thought he was greedy.
The 30-year-old boy confessed unsuccessfully because he bought a fake ring for the girl.
In order to quickly inherit the family's career, the guy gave up the confession of the girl he loved to marry the daughter of a tycoon family.
Unable to accept that the girl was close to other men, he decided to confess to the girl. But she rejected him because she didn't like him because he was poor
The girl was very happy when the boy confessed, but suddenly another girl appeared and claimed to be his fianc√©e
Right at the wedding ceremony, the girl canceled the wedding because she discovered that her boyfriend's house was poor. The guy directly confessed to his best friend and left the wedding
The boy who confessed was rejected by the girl from the first sentence because his mouth was so rotten that she couldn't stand it.
The boy who confessed failed because he was so handsome that the girl didn't feel safe around him.
The girl thought the guy she asked to kiss her but found out it wasn't herself but her best friend
After two months of accepting the confession, the girl discovered that the boy was a promiscuous boy and digger
